buffs.description: The maximum value of [Airship VIP] can be increased up to 30%.
buffs.name: Airship VIP

hidden_abilites: Increases self movement speed by 10% and attack power by 10%.
Increases attack distance and critical damage by 6% and movement speed by 5% for all units.
Attack power and critical damage probability increases greatly against enemy crystal.
[Laser Beam] Additional Summon: Push enemy back, stun them and summon another AI .
The maximum value of [Airship VIP] can be increased up to 30%. In other words, it can reduce the cost of purchasing fuel by up to 30%
description.skill2: Reach limit break of Maximum Medal Buff from transcended Unit in Time Shop (0%, 0%, 300%, 400%, 500%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Astral Captain ]
